Package com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.corpus

Various extensions for corpus manipulation and analysis, including classes for autoamtically modifying or projectifying a corpus, and classes for calculating corpus statistics.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CorpusModifier
    Modifies a corpus in simple ways, by replacing labels with other ones, or removing dependencies.
    The input file has the following format:
    GOVPOS\tGOV\tDEPPOS\tDEP\tLABEL\tACTION\tNEWLABEL
    Where GOVPOS is the governor's pos-tag, or * for any.
    GOV is the governor's word form, or * for any.
    DEPPOS is the dependent's pos-tag, or * for any
    DEP is the dependent's word form, or * for any
    LABEL is the current label, or * for any
    ACTION is either Replace or Remove
    NEWLABEL is a new label, only required if action is Replace.
    Any line starting with # is ignored.
    CorpusProjectifier
    Transforms a non-projective corpus to a projective corpus by attaching non-projective arcs to the nearest projective head.
    CorpusStatistics
    A class for gathering statistics from a given corpus.
    PosTaggerStatistics
    A class for gathering statistics from a given corpus.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.corpus Description

Various extensions for corpus manipulation and analysis, including classes for autoamtically modifying or projectifying a corpus, and classes for calculating corpus statistics.
